query: SELECT p.orderNumber, h.customerName, COUNT(pl.id) as line_count, SUM(CAST(pl.quantity AS DECIMAL)) as total_curtains FROM purchases p JOIN hospitals h ON p.hospitalId = h.id LEFT JOIN purchaseLines pl ON pl.purchaseId = p.id WHERE p.orderNumber = 'SO-U-00000839' GROUP BY p.orderNumber, h.customerName
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3xdfM6hBeGk8i8i.5dbeac8a2102 --database DxAqoJ22pGdNTCdjRs8uzu --execute SELECT p.orderNumber, h.customerName, COUNT(pl.id) as line_count, SUM(CAST(pl.quantity AS DECIMAL)) as total_curtains FROM purchases p JOIN hospitals h ON p.hospitalId = h.id LEFT JOIN purchaseLines pl ON pl.purchaseId = p.id WHERE p.orderNumber = 'SO-U-00000839' GROUP BY p.orderNumber, h.customerName
